channel.title: Worked Example :: Introduction to Python
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Finally, letâ€™s go through a complete worked example program that uses dictionaries in Python. Consider the following problem statement: Write a program that will compute the score of a given word in a game of Scrabble. Assume that there are no special squares present. The program should prompt the user to input a string that only contains letters, and then compute the total score of that string by summing the value assigned to each letter.
